page.title: 02SETTLEMENTS
page.content: The whole area is thinly settled. Apart from a few scattered farms there are only three settlements, all in the south of the area, The village of Loddiswell, The hamlet of Woodleigh, The hamlet of The Mounts. Loddiswell is by far the largest of the three places.Its earliest growth was below the church, in Well Street, but the village has spread up to the higher, more level ground to the west. In the last ten years many new houses have been built. In Elmwood Park there is quite a large estate of detatched, semi detatched, and terraced houses and bungalows. Nearby in Oakwood Park there is a small development of detatched or linked houses, built on a site where wartime "prefabs" once stood.
